# makeSync

Makes a function synchronous by enqueuing its executions.

```typescript
makeSync<T extends (...args: any) => any>(func: T): T
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description                   |
| --------- | ---- | ----------------------------- |
| func      | `T`  | Function to make synchronous. |

## Returns

`T`
